issue.title: [C++] Use FindThreads.cmake to handle -pthread compiler/link options
issue.body:
***Note**: This issue was originally created as [ARROW-4330](https://issues.apache.org/jira/browse/ARROW-4330). Please see the [migration documentation](https://gist.github.com/toddfarmer/12aa88361532d21902818a6044fda4c3) for further details.*

### Original Issue Description:
We are using `find_library` to find pthread which may not work for non-system gcc toolchains. The preferred way it seems to handle this is with `find_package(Threads REQUIRED)`. I will submit a patch
